info.title: US Sales Tax Rates
info.description: Accurate and up-to-date sales tax information across the United States. Streamlines complex sales tax calculation, making compliance with tax regulations effortless for e-commerce platforms, financial applications, and business owners. Provides precise tax rates including state, county, city, and special rates. Tax rates expressed as decimal values (e.g., 0.04450 = 4.45%). Supports lookup by ZIP code and search by city name.

get.summary: Get sales tax rates by ZIP code
get.description: Retrieves sales tax information using a ZIP code. Returns state rate, county rate, city rate, special rate, and city name. Tax rates are expressed as decimal values (e.g., 0.04450 = 4.45%).

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: US ZIP code to lookup tax rates, e.g.: 99675, 90001, 70663

post.summary: Search sales tax rates by city name
post.description: Searches for sales tax rates by city name or partial name. Returns a list of matching locations with their tax information including state, county, city, and special rates. Allows specifying the number of results to return.

city.description: City name or partial name to search, e.g.: 'los', 'new york', 'chicago'

take.description: Number of results to return, e.g.: 3, 5, 10. Limits the response size.
